text: Island Women is a 1958 American drama film directed by William Berke and written by Andrew Alexander and Philip Yordan. The film stars Marie Windsor, Vince Edwards, Marilee Earle, Leslie Scott and Irene Williams. The film was released in May 1958, by United Artists. == Cast == *Marie Windsor as Elizabeth *Vince Edwards as Mike *Marilee Earle as Jan *Leslie Scott as Eban *Irene Williams as Iron Woman *Kay Barnes as Mary Ann *Paul White as Constable *Maurine Duvalier as Calypso Mama == References == == External links == * Category:1958 films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:United Artists films Category:American drama films Category:1958 drama films Category:Films directed by William A. Berke
title: Island Women
